verses.verse: And I <S%G1492>saw<s%> a <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> and a <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G1093>earth:<s%> for the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> and the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G1093>earth<s%> were <S%G3928>passed<s%> away; and there was <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G2089>more<s%> <S%G2281>sea.<s%>

And I <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> the <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G4172>city,<s%> <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G2597>coming<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> from <S%G2316>God<s%> out of <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G2090>prepared<s%> as a <S%G3565>bride<s%> <S%G2885>adorned<s%> for her <S%G435>husband.<s%>

And I <S%G191>heard<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> out of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> the <S%G4633>tabernacle<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is with <S%G444>men,<s%> and he will <S%G4637>dwell<s%> with them, and they shall be his <S%G2992>people,<s%> and <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> shall be with them, and be their <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And <S%G2316>God<s%> shall <S%G1813>wipe<s%> <S%G1813>away<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1144>tears<s%> from their <S%G3788>eyes;<s%> and there shall be <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G2089>more<s%> <S%G2288>death,<s%> <S%G3777>neither<s%> <S%G3997>sorrow,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G2906>crying,<s%> neither shall there be <S%G2089>any<s%> <S%G2089>more<s%> <S%G4192>pain:<s%> for the <S%G4413>former<s%> things are <S%G565>passed<s%> <S%G565>away.<s%>

And he that <S%G2521>sat<s%> on the <S%G2362>throne<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> I <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things new. <S%G2537><s%> And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to me, <S%G1125>Write:<s%> for <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3056>words<s%> are <S%G228>true<s%> and faithful. <S%G4103><s%>

And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to me, It is <S%G1096>done.<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G1>Alpha<s%> and <S%G5598>Omega,<s%> the <S%G746>beginning<s%> and the <S%G5056>end.<s%> I will <S%G1325>give<s%> to him that is <S%G1372>thirsty<s%> of the <S%G4077>fountain<s%> of the <S%G5204>water<s%> of <S%G2222>life<s%> freely. <S%G1432><s%>
He that <S%G3528>overcomes<s%> shall <S%G2816>inherit<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things; and I will be his <S%G2316>God,<s%> and he shall be my son. <S%G5207><s%>

But the <S%G1169>fearful,<s%> and <S%G571>unbelieving,<s%> and the <S%G948>abominable,<s%> and <S%G5406>murderers,<s%> and <S%G4205>fornicators,<s%> and <S%G5332>sorcerers,<s%> and <S%G1496>idolaters,<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5571>liars,<s%> shall have their <S%G3313>part<s%> in the <S%G3041>lake<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2545>burns<s%> with <S%G4442>fire<s%> and <S%G2303>brimstone:<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> is the <S%G1208>second<s%> death. <S%G2288><s%>

And there <S%G2064>came<s%> to me <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G5357>vials<s%> <S%G1073>full<s%> of the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G4127>plagues,<s%> and <S%G2980>talked<s%> with me, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1204>Come<s%> <S%G1204>here,<s%> I will <S%G1166>show<s%> you the <S%G3565>bride,<s%> the <S%G721>Lamb's<s%> <S%G1135>wife.<s%>

And he <S%G667>carried<s%> me <S%G667>away<s%> in the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> to a <S%G3173>great<s%> and <S%G5308>high<s%> <S%G3735>mountain,<s%> and <S%G1166>showed<s%> me that <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4172>city,<s%> the <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G2597>descending<s%> out of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> from <S%G2316>God,<s%>

<S%G2192>Having<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G2316>God:<s%> and her <S%G5458>light<s%> was <S%G3664>like<s%> to a <S%G3037>stone<s%> most <S%G5093>precious,<s%> <S%G5613>even<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> a <S%G2393>jasper<s%> <S%G3037>stone,<s%> <S%G2929>clear<s%> as <S%G2929>crystal;<s%>

And <S%G2192>had<s%> a <S%G5038>wall<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> and <S%G5308>high,<s%> and <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G4440>gates,<s%> and <S%G1909>at<s%> the <S%G4440>gates<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G32>angels,<s%> and <S%G3686>names<s%> <S%G1924>written<s%> <S%G1924>thereon,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> are the names of the <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5443>tribes<s%> of the <S%G5207>children<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel:<s%>

<S%G575>On<s%> the <S%G395>east<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G4440>gates;<s%> <S%G575>on<s%> the <S%G1005>north<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G4440>gates;<s%> <S%G575>on<s%> the <S%G3558>south<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G4440>gates;<s%> and <S%G575>on<s%> the <S%G1424>west<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G4440>gates.<s%>

And the <S%G5038>wall<s%> of the <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G2310>foundations,<s%> and in them the <S%G3686>names<s%> of the <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G652>apostles<s%> of the <S%G721>Lamb.<s%>

And he that <S%G2980>talked<s%> with me <S%G2192>had<s%> a <S%G5552>golden<s%> <S%G2563>reed<s%> to <S%G3354>measure<s%> the <S%G4172>city,<s%> and the <S%G4440>gates<s%> <S%G846>thereof,<s%> and the <S%G5038>wall<s%> <S%G846>thereof.<s%>

And the <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G2749>lies<s%> <S%G5068>foursquare,<s%> and the <S%G3372>length<s%> is as <S%G5118>large<s%> as the <S%G4114>breadth:<s%> and he <S%G3354>measured<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%> with the <S%G2563>reed,<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5505>thousand<s%> <S%G4712>furlongs.<s%> The <S%G3372>length<s%> and the <S%G4114>breadth<s%> and the <S%G5311>height<s%> of it are <S%G2470>equal.<s%>

And he <S%G3354>measured<s%> the <S%G5038>wall<s%> <S%G846>thereof,<s%> an <S%G1540>hundred<s%> and <S%G5062>forty<s%> and <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G4083>cubits,<s%> according to the <S%G3358>measure<s%> of a <S%G444>man,<s%> that is, of the <S%G32>angel.<s%>

And the <S%G1739>building<s%> of the <S%G5038>wall<s%> of it was of <S%G2393>jasper:<s%> and the <S%G4172>city<s%> was <S%G2513>pure<s%> <S%G5553>gold,<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%> to <S%G2513>clear<s%> <S%G5194>glass.<s%>

And the <S%G2310>foundations<s%> of the <S%G5038>wall<s%> of the <S%G4172>city<s%> were <S%G2885>garnished<s%> with <S%G3956>all<s%> manner of <S%G5093>precious<s%> <S%G3037>stones.<s%> The <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2310>foundation<s%> was <S%G2393>jasper;<s%> the <S%G1208>second,<s%> <S%G4552>sapphire;<s%> the <S%G5154>third,<s%> a <S%G5472>chalcedony;<s%> the <S%G5067>fourth,<s%> an <S%G4665>emerald;<s%>

The <S%G3991>fifth,<s%> <S%G4557>sardonyx;<s%> the <S%G1623>sixth,<s%> <S%G4556>sardius;<s%> the <S%G1442>seventh,<s%> <S%G5555>chrysolyte;<s%> the <S%G3590>eighth,<s%> <S%G969>beryl;<s%> the <S%G1766>ninth,<s%> a <S%G5116>topaz;<s%> the <S%G1182>tenth,<s%> a <S%G5556>chrysoprasus;<s%> the <S%G1734>eleventh,<s%> a <S%G5192>jacinth;<s%> the <S%G1428>twelfth,<s%> an <S%G271>amethyst.<s%>

And the <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G4440>gates<s%> were <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G3135>pearls:<s%> <S%G1538>every<s%> <S%G303>several<s%> <S%G1520><s%> <S%G3588>gate<s%> <S%G4440><s%> was of <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G3135>pearl:<s%> and the <S%G4113>street<s%> of the <S%G4172>city<s%> was <S%G2513>pure<s%> <S%G5553>gold,<s%> as it were <S%G1307>transparent<s%> <S%G5194>glass.<s%>

And I <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3485>temple<s%> <S%G1722>therein:<s%> <S%G846><s%>for the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3841>Almighty<s%> and the <S%G721>Lamb<s%> are the <S%G3485>temple<s%> of it.

And the <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> of the <S%G2246>sun,<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> of the <S%G4582>moon,<s%> to <S%G5316>shine<s%> in it: for the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> did <S%G5461>lighten<s%> it, and the <S%G721>Lamb<s%> is the <S%G3088>light<s%> <S%G846>thereof.<s%>

And the <S%G1484>nations<s%> of them which are <S%G4982>saved<s%> shall <S%G4043>walk<s%> in the <S%G5457>light<s%> of it: and the <S%G935>kings<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%> do <S%G5342>bring<s%> their <S%G1391>glory<s%> and <S%G5092>honor<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> it.
And the <S%G4440>gates<s%> of it shall not be <S%G2808>shut<s%> at <S%G3364>all<s%> by <S%G2250>day:<s%> for there shall be <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3571>night<s%> <S%G1563>there.<s%>
And they shall <S%G5342>bring<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> and <S%G5092>honor<s%> of the <S%G1484>nations<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> it.

And there shall in <S%G3364>no<s%> wise <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> it <S%G3956>any<s%> thing that <S%G2840>defiles,<s%> neither whatever <S%G4160>works<s%> <S%G946>abomination,<s%> <S%G2532>or<s%> makes a <S%G5579>lie:<s%> but they which are <S%G1125>written<s%> in the <S%G721>Lamb's<s%> <S%G975>book<s%> of <S%G2222>life.<s%>
